info.help_text:
This report provides information about the IP statistics at RNC Iu-CS interface.

Use Case info: this report should only be used at regional cluster level.

kpi.name: RNC_1630a
kpi.formula:
decode( (iprout.period_duration),0,null,
(8*(iprout.in_data_ip_route) / (60*iprout.period_duration*1000)))

kpi_info.title: IP Iu-CS throughput - ingress
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the Iu-CS IP layer downlink throughput in RNC.
kpi_info.formula:
8* SUM(IN_DATA_IP_ROUTE)
------------------------
SUM(60 * PERIOD_DURATION)*1000

kpi.name: RNC_1629a
kpi.formula:
decode( (iprout.period_duration),0,null,
(8*(iprout.out_data_ip_route) / (60*iprout.period_duration*1000)))

kpi_info.title: IP Iu-CS throughput - egress
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the Iu-CS IP layer uplink throughput in RNC.
kpi_info.formula:
8* SUM(OUT_DATA_IP_ROUTE)
------------------------
SUM(60 * PERIOD_DURATION)*1000

kpi.name: RNC_1909b
kpi.formula:
100*decode( (iprout.committed_bit_rate_ip_route),0,null,
(iprout.max_reserved_rate_ip_route) / (iprout.committed_bit_rate_ip_route))

kpi_info.title: Max Reserved IP based route bandwidth
kpi_info.use: Maximum value of IP bandwidth usage rate, comparing the maximum value of reserved IP layer bit rate against the available bandwidth
kpi_info.formula:
100*
MAX(MAX_RESERVED_RATE_IP_ROUTE)
/
AVG(COMMITTED_BIT_RATE_IP_ROUTE)

kpi.name: RNC_5052a
kpi.formula:
decode( (iprout.committed_bit_rate_ip_route*iprout.nbr_samples_ip_route),0,null,
(100*((iprout.sum_reserved_rate_ip_route / iprout.nbr_samples_ip_route) / iprout.committed_bit_rate_ip_route)))

kpi_info.title: IP Route Egress Reservation Rate
kpi_info.use: This tells the reservation rate of guaranteed IP transport resources
kpi_info.formula:
100 *(sum (SUM_RESERVED_RATE_IP_ROUTE/NBR_SAMPLES_IP_ROUTE)
/
(sum COMMITTED_BIT_RATE_IP_ROUTE))

kpi.name: RNC_1248b
kpi.formula:
decode( (rtprtcp.rec_rtp_packets*10 + rtprtcp.lost_rtp_packets),0,null,
(100*(rtprtcp.lost_rtp_packets) / (rtprtcp.rec_rtp_packets*10 + rtprtcp.lost_rtp_packets)))

kpi_info.title: Iu-CS RTP layer loss ratio - ingress
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides the ingress RTP packet loss ratio in RNC.
kpi_info.formula:
100*SUM(LOST_RTP_PACKETS)
------------------------
SUM(REC_RTP_PACKETS*10 + LOST_RTP_PACKETS)

kpi.name: RNC_1249a
kpi.formula:
decode( (rtprtcp.sent_rtp_packets),0,null,
(100*(rtprtcp.lost_egress_rtp_packets) / (rtprtcp.sent_rtp_packets*10)))

kpi_info.title: Iu-CS RTP layer loss ratio - egress
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides the egress RTP packet loss ratio in RNC. The lost RTP data packets in egress direction are reported to be missing by MGW using RTCP protocol messages.
kpi_info.formula:
100*SUM(LOST_EGRESS_RTP_PACKETS)
---------------------
SUM(SENT_RTP_PACKETS*10)

kpi.name: M803C27
kpi.formula: rtprtcp.max_rtp_jitter

kpi_info.title: MAX_RTP_JITTER
kpi_info.use: The maximum jitter value within the collected 5 second samples during the measurement interval. UPDATED: The jitter is sampled with 5 second intervals for each RTP connection.
kpi_info.formula: SUM(MAX_RTP_JITTER)

(100*(rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_1) / (rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_1 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_2 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_3 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_4 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_5 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_6 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_7 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_8 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_9 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_10 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_11 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_12 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_13 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_14 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_15 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_16 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_17 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_18 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_19 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_20)))
